dialogues.text:
Obstacle detected:
A pit with hazardous spikes.
Falling is strongly discouraged.
I noticed. Whatâ€™s your plan, genius?

Solution: Jump across. Alternative strategies: 
     .      .       .    
None.

Distance calculated. Probability of success: 92%,
assuming adequate execution. 
Remaining 8% is... less ideal.

92%. Practically a guarantee. 
 What could possibly go wrong?

Statistically speaking:
poor judgment, miscalculation, or gravity.
All fatal.

Important:
Altering trajectory mid-air can mitigate risk.

Duly noted.
Any other words of encouragement?

Scans indicate similar hazards ahead.
Adjust jump duration for increased height.

The longer you hold, the higher you go.
Consider it... applied physics.

Physics is my favorite subject when my life depends on it.
Watch and learn.
